title: 1 person killed, 2 hospitalized after car crashes into Central Mass. home
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News One person died after they were dragged under the vehicle that crashed into the home, and two more people were injured.
One person was killed and two others were injured Wednesday afternoon after a car crashed into a garage in Leicester, according to authorities.

title: Former Emmanuel admissions director pleads guilty to attempted sex trafficking, cyberstalking
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The former assistant admissions director pleaded guilty to trying to get several admitted or prospective students to have sex with him.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A former assistant admissions director at Emmanuel College pleaded guilty Wednesday to attempting to get an underage college applicant to have commercial sex with him, according to prosecutors.

title: Worcester police seek help identifying suspects involved in unarmed robberies targeting elderly
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime Police shared photos of the suspects and their vehicles seeking the public’s help identifying and locating them.
By Darin Zullo November 13, 2025 | 6:58 PM 1 minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
The Worcester Police Department is seeking the public’s help identifying and finding multiple suspects connected to a series of unarmed robberies.

title: Manchester-by-the-Sea police, firefighters rescue woman stuck in swamp
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News Photos shared by the fire department show first responders wading through waist-deep water toward the woman.
Police and firefighters in Manchester-by-the-Sea located a person who was got stuck in a swampy area in the woods off Route 128.

Manchester-by-the-Sea Fire Department By Sana Muneer November 13, 2025 | 6:43 PM 1 minute to read Manchester-by-the-Sea police and firefighters on Wednesday rescued a woman stuck in a swampy area in the woods off Route 128, officials said.

title: The best sports streaming options for Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins, and Celtics fans
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Streaming Watching every Patriots, Celtics, Bruins, and Red Sox game on TV can be tough without shelling out a lot of money for cable.
